name: Attella
tag_list: onsite-and-offsite-document-scanning, e-discovery, litigation-support, knowledge-management, information-management, content-management-system, secure-document-shredding, paperless-office, computer-support, network-support, system-integration, data--recov
overview:
Attella provide information technology support services, document management, and information management services to all size businesses and individuals. Located in San Diego CA, Attella provides services to customers located throughout the US and overseas.

Services include: Onsite and Offsite Document Scanning E-discovery litigation support Knowledge management information management Content management systems Secure document shredding Paperless office Computer and network support System integration Data recovery computer repair System security network security Database development software development
